trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Loudonville

divs: Sighting Detailsi HAVE HUNTED dEER IN THIS AREA FOR SEVERAL YEARS. tHE FIRST SIGHTING WAS ABOUT 15 YEARS AGO. iT WAS JUST A LIGHT IN THE SKY. NO MOVEMENT. oBSERVED. tWO YEARS LATER AT THE SAME LOCATION i SAW A LIGHT STATIONARY THAT THEN STARTED TO MOVE. aS IT STARTED NORTHWEST UPWARD IT CHANGED COLOR FROM SILVER AND STARTED TO EMIT FLAME LIKE TAIL START. iT GAINED SPEED AND WENT OUT OUT OF SIGHT INTO THE CLOUDS.tHE THIRD SIGHTING WAS THE TWO SILVER BALLS CONNEDTED TOGETHER. mOVING APPROX. 25 mph AT 500 fT. ABOVE ME. i HAVE SEEN NOTHING ELSE THEN AS i HAVE NOT BEEN IN THAT AREA.
Summary: Two round balls connected together. Silver in color. Moving slowly north at 20 MPH. No sound.
